pages.text: $(marked)Curses$() are malicious magic cast with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier)$(item)Brazier$().$(br2)To cast an effective curse, you will need the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)$(item)Taglock$() of your target and put it in the Brazier, in addition to the other ingredients.$(br2)After putting in all of the ingredients, light the Brazier to cast the curse.
Do note that all curses need at least 400 ME available.$(br2)Curses will wear off after seven days, but they can also be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/cleansing)cleansed$() using the respective ritual.
